Senior Procurement Officer Job at Sayed Farms Limited




        
    

        
        Sayed Farms Limited specialized in the poultry sector, covering all its major aspects, and also in the distribution of frozen food in the Nigerian Market. Our line of frozen products has expanded to include the finest quality of chicken, potatoes, cheese, vegetables, seafood, and ice cream products in the market.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job osition: Senior Procurement Officer

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities

	Lead procurement processes from requisition to delivery, ensuring timely and cost-effective purchases.
	Analyze procurement needs and develop purchasing strategies aligned with organizational goals.
	Source, evaluate, and negotiate with suppliers and vendors to secure advantageous terms.
	Manage supplier performance, contracts, and compliance with internal policies and legal requirements.
	Understand and maintain knowledge of FMCG, and develop and implement strategies to ensure cost effective supply of services to meet the company’s procurement plan
	Develop procurement plans to ensure goods (machine and automobile spare parts, raw materials and others) are secure at appropriate times.
	Work closely with departmental heads in developing procurement plans
	Monitor market trends and conduct cost analyses to identify opportunities for savings.
	Prepare procurement reports, KPIs, and documentation for audits and management reviews.
	Ensure adherence to procurement policies, ethical standards, and best practices.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in supply chain management, Business Administration, Procurement, or related field.
	Minimum 7 years of experience in general procurement, preferably in a senior or supervisory role.
	Experience in drafting, negotiating and contract management of high value and high-risk
	Knowledge of suppliers, markets, trends of company’s machine and automobile spare parts, raw materials and others.
	Experience in applying efficient procurement processes, structures and analytical tools
	Proficient in procurement software and Microsoft Office Suite (especially Excel).
	Ability to manage multiple priorities and meet deadlines under pressure.
	Familiarity with contract law and risk management practices is a plus.
	Professional certification (e.g., CIPS, CPSM) is an advantage.


Key skills and Competencies:


	Strong technical knowledge of procurements.
	Have strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Be able to pay attention to details and accuracy.
	Have excellent time management and prioritization skills.
	Excellent communication skills.
	Be able to thrive in a collaborative, fast-paced environment
	Ability to lead and mentor a team.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application Letters and CV along with passport photographs to: jobs@sayedfarms.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Executive Assistant to the CEO",
  "description": "High Performance Consulting is a professional service organization, dedicated to corporate and individual development towards achieving productivity and high performance and different level with the business and other phases.

We design and implement diverse strategies to organizations and businesses by providing bespoke solutions required to achieve the set goals and beyond.

We provide professional services ranging from training of employees, recuitment, business consulting and coaching to get optimal result.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant to the CEO

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Executive Assistant is responsible for providing comprehensive support and provide high-quality administrative support to the executive team, project management, analyse documents, prepare research reports, and occasionally supervise staff members.
	To be successful in this role, the executive assistant should be well-organized, have great time management skills and be able to act without guidance.


Responsibilties


	Receives and directs telephone calls and emails to the office.
	Performs Executive administrative duties.
	Take minutes during meetings.
	Will be responsible for managing schedules and Managing projects.
	Must maintain confidentiality and trust in all situations.
	Carry out administrative support duties
	Ensure that the principal is briefed on all activities being carried out in the office
	Provide project administration and management support


Academic Qualification and other Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree
	Minimum of 3 - 5 years of experience in administrative support functions.
	Additional professional qualifications in project management will be an added advantage.
	Proficient in Microsoft Office (Outlook, Word, Excel, and PowerPoint), Adobe Acrobat, and social media web platforms.


Required Skills:


	Ability to create new ideas, relationships, or systems including creative contributions.
	Must possess very strong interpersonal skills and the ability to build relationships with key stakeholders.
	Project Management skills
